thread.section_title: hub by Premier Inn Spitalfields, Brick Lane - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: AMAZING
thread.title_full: AMAZING - Review of hub by Premier Inn Spitalfields, Brick Lane, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Ryan F
title: AMAZING
text:
Stayed here for 2 night and I have to say it's one of the best hotels I've stayed in for the money!
Although the rooms are very small (which is well documented) the way they have designed them creates a very cosy room! Very clean and very modern with touch screens above your bed on either side, to adjust lighting and air conditioning which in my eyes is amazing! Nice size bathroom with a really good shower! Very friendly staff and very welcoming reception!
Amazing location right next to the truemens brewery and only a stones throw away from the nearest tube station!
Only thing that I found a little annoying was that you had to scan your room card to operate the lift, but would 1 % recommend stopping here!
